src:
Data dan Fakta Premier League: Manchester City vs Southampton
01 Nov 2019, 16:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Peringkat 2 Manchester City akan menjamu peringkat 18 Southampton pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Etihad Stadium ini.
Tengah pekan kemarin, City baru mengalahkan Southampton 3-1 di babak 16 besar Carabao Cup. City menang lewat gol-gol Nicolas Otamendi dan Sergio Aguero (2), sedangkan Southampton cuma bisa menipiskan selisih skor melalui Jack Stephens.
Dalam laga kandangnya melawan Southampton di Premier League musim lalu, City menang 6-1 lewat gol-gol Sergio Aguero, David Silva, Raheem Sterling (2), Leroy Sane, dan bunuh diri Wesley Hoedt. Gol hiburan Southampton dicetak Danny Ings lewat titik penalti.
City selalu menang dalam 6 laga terakhirnya melawan Southampton di semua kompetisi.
City selalu mencetak 3 gol atau lebih dalam 3 laga terakhirnya melawan Southampton di semua kompetisi.
City cuma 1 kali clean sheet dalam 5 laga terakhirnya melawan Southampton di semua kompetisi.
Selalu tercipta 3 gol atau lebih dalam 9 dari 11 laga kandang terakhir City melawan Southampton di semua kompetisi.
City adalah tim terproduktif di Premier League 2019/20 sejauh ini, dengan 32 gol, sedangkan Southampton merupakan tim pemilik pertahanan terburuk, sudah kebobolan 25 gol.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Premier League Data and Facts: Manchester City vs Southampton
Nov 01 2019, 16:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rank 2 Manchester City will host Southampton 18th in Week 11 of the Premier League 2019/20, Saturday (11/02/2019). Here are some data and facts that lay behind the match at the Etihad Stadium.
In the middle of last week, the new City beat Southampton 3-1 in the last 16 of the Carabao Cup. City won through the goals of Nicolas Otamendi and Sergio Aguero (2), while Southampton could only attenuate the difference in score through Jack Stephens.
In his home game against Southampton in the Premier League last season, City won 6-1 through goals from Sergio Aguero, David Silva, Raheem Sterling (2), Leroy Sane, and Wesley Hoedt's suicide. Southampton consolation goal printed by Danny Ings through the penalty spot.
City have always won in their last 6 matches against Southampton in all competitions.
City have always scored 3 or more goals in their last 3 matches against Southampton in all competitions.
City have only had one clean sheet in their last 5 matches against Southampton in all competitions.
There have always been 3 or more goals scored in 9 of City's last 11 home matches against Southampton in all competitions.
City are the most productive team in the 2019/20 Premier League so far, with 32 goals, while Southampton is the worst defense team, having conceded 25 goals.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
